root.message: The COLL_METHOD field for indicator 11-6-3, translated into en
root.data:
Table 0401.1/BTNMT, statistical reporting mode issued by the Ministry of Natural Resources and Environment

More information at the link: http://dwrm.gov.vn/uploads/laws/file/2017/2018/20-2018-tt-btnmt-quy-dinh-che-do-bao-cao-thong -ke-nganh-tnmt.pdf
